UniprotID	A2VDF0
Accession	A2VDF0;A1L300;Q5VWY2;Q5VWY3;Q6ZPD2
EntryName	FUCM_HUMAN
ProteinName	Fucose mutarotase (EC 5.1.3.29)
GeneName	FUOM C10orf125
Length	154
Function	Involved in the interconversion between alpha- and beta-L-fucoses. L-Fucose (6-deoxy-L-galactose) exists as alpha-L-fucose (29.5%) and beta-L-fucose (70.5%), the beta-form is metabolized through the salvage pathway. GDP-L-fucose formed either by the de novo or salvage pathways is transported into the endoplasmic reticulum, where it serves as a substrate for N- and O-glycosylations by fucosyltransferases. Fucosylated structures expressed on cell surfaces or secreted in biological fluids are believed to play a critical role in cell-cell adhesion and recognition processes.
Subcellular Location	
Disorder	0.0205,0.0320,0.0662,0.1115,0.0690,0.0454,0.0287,0.0306,0.0223,0.0231,0.0287,0.0287,0.0454,0.0568,0.0948,0.1070,0.1184,0.1007,0.0543,0.0380,0.0518,0.0967,0.0555,0.0494,0.0209,0.0424,0.0581,0.1048,0.1251,0.1184,0.0909,0.1007,0.0799,0.0799,0.0967,0.0734,0.0749,0.0341,0.0631,0.0780,0.1424,0.1702,0.0948,0.1554,0.0780,0.1791,0.1583,0.1184,0.0690,0.0780,0.1162,0.1184,0.0631,0.1007,0.0581,0.0269,0.0424,0.0218,0.0454,0.0494,0.0341,0.0202,0.0227,0.0389,0.0483,0.0749,0.0483,0.0287,0.0380,0.0780,0.0380,0.0300,0.0592,0.1028,0.1162,0.1852,0.2918,0.2609,0.3494,0.2436,0.2399,0.3494,0.4582,0.3599,0.2541,0.2364,0.2951,0.2328,0.3286,0.3704,0.2436,0.2470,0.3182,0.2849,0.2503,0.2328,0.1611,0.0948,0.0929,0.0749,0.0765,0.0581,0.0518,0.0227,0.0405,0.0780,0.0341,0.0341,0.0306,0.0163,0.0181,0.0327,0.0463,0.0454,0.0443,0.0443,0.0223,0.0281,0.0287,0.0191,0.0194,0.0349,0.0433,0.0494,0.1028,0.0734,0.0424,0.0506,0.0443,0.0985,0.1028,0.0494,0.0294,0.0356,0.0356,0.0364,0.0287,0.0341,0.0349,0.0313,0.0543,0.0817,0.0433,0.0248,0.0178,0.0130,0.0120,0.0153,0.0214,0.0157,0.0102,0.0134,0.0214,0.0349
